behaviors.desc: `iron-range-behavior` provides the behavior for something with a minimum to maximum range.

jsdoc.description: `iron-range-behavior` provides the behavior for something with a minimum to maximum range.
jsdoc.orig:
* 
 * `iron-range-behavior` provides the behavior for something with a minimum to maximum range.
 *
 * @demo demo/index.html
 * @polymerBehavior

properties.name: max
properties.desc: The number that indicates the maximum value of the range.

jsdoc.description: The number that indicates the maximum value of the range.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * The number that indicates the maximum value of the range.

properties.name: min
properties.desc: The number that indicates the minimum value of the range.

jsdoc.description: The number that indicates the minimum value of the range.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * The number that indicates the minimum value of the range.

properties.name: ratio
properties.desc: Returns the ratio of the value.

jsdoc.description: Returns the ratio of the value.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Returns the ratio of the value.

properties.name: step
properties.desc: Specifies the value granularity of the range's value.

jsdoc.description: Specifies the value granularity of the range's value.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Specifies the value granularity of the range's value.

properties.name: value
properties.desc: The number that represents the current value.

jsdoc.description: The number that represents the current value.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * The number that represents the current value.
